item.title: My "tech" stack
item.description: I love these posts, stumbling onto someone I admire’s personal blog and finding a list of the tech they use is nice. It pointlessly interests me. It’s useless guff that might make me feel a way or might make me feel nothing, but there’s a joy in just the basics of seeing through someone else’s experience via the way they choose to work.
item.dc:creator: Maurice Elliott

item.title: I have no mouth, yet I must scream.
item.dc:creator: Maurice Elliott
